title: Block Out: Again
content:
I've just recreated _Block Out_ using FontStruct in a matter of minutes.

[http://fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/block\_out\_1](http://web.archive.org/web/20120611234453/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/block_out_1 "http://fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/block\_out\_1")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120611234453im_/http:/typophile.com/files/block-out-again_4209.gif)
author: gingerbeardman

comments.content: I guess there are times in life when you just don't set a Z and a 2 next to each other.
